website_summaries.verdict: Look past the awkwardly long straps and you'll discover a top-notch wrist brace that offers excellent support.
pros: Contoured palmar splint fits well and does a good job of immobilizing the wrist, but still allows wearers to go about daily tasks
Lightweight and slim enough to wear under sleeves
Suitable for rehabilitative use or ongoing support of chronic conditions
cons: Straps are very long and may need to be trimmed

customer_reviews.title: I have recommended to many patients to get wrist splints for night ...
customer_reviews.text: I have recommended to many patients to get wrist splints for night time for carpal tunnel, but when I developed carpal tunnel I was not entirely sure which to try. These looked like they would give good support so I gave them a try. They did not work for my carpal tunnel - it puts too much pressure over the median nerve and actually made my symptoms worse. The key is to keep the wrist in a neutral position at night without putting pressure on the nerve, and these do not do that at all. I ended up returning it since it was not helping. It may work for other purposes but definitely would not recommend for carpal tunnel.
customer_reviews.author: Mose Schrute

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, a couple minor flaws still.
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite carpal tunnel splints, and I've tried many including custom splints. I do wish the thumb hole was a little bit longer. If you want to wear them during the day it can rub uncomfortably on the base of the thumb (see photo). I also had to customize the metal bar inside the splint. I've also found sometimes the bar slips down too far, which impeads proper function and is not comfortable. My solution for this was to add a piece of Velcro sticker on the bar and stick it to the inside of the bar space.
customer_reviews.author: Kristelg

customer_reviews.title: It's comfortable and not too bulky
customer_reviews.text: Got this after wrist surgery from a bike accident. It's comfortable and not too bulky. If you're REALLY tender, the metal might be more hindrance than help, but other than that I find this item works great for me. I wear it while riding in case of another crash. It does not become a liability during the ride. As with ALL things Velcro, eventually the Velcro wears out, but I certainly think you'll get your 12 bucks out of this first.
customer_reviews.author: Nemesis

customer_reviews.title: Very Goid Quality.
customer_reviews.text: DonJoy is a great company selling REAL medical-grade braces. I recently started a new job and initially I was having such bad carpal tunnel irritation I ran to Amazon to see what was on offer. Ultimately, you need a full brace, not an elastic sleeve. This braces allows your blood to flow and provides rigid support which trust me, you need. ESPECIALLY if you are going to wear these at night. The interior is soft enough and in general the brace is quite comfortable. I only had to wear mine for about 4 work days before the (internal) inflammation had finally subsided; I am sure these braces provided the rest my wrists needed.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Kinsey

customer_reviews.title: Great!! Product
customer_reviews.text: I like the how comfortable this product is i have tried several different ones. After my visit to the orthopedic where they tried to sell me one at triple the cost!! I bought this used and it looks brand new!! I suffer from carpal tunnel syndrome, and tendonitis and all other braces hurt my tendinitis so bad i could not where them. Because the straps went around the side of my waist.
customer_reviews.author: Holly M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for little wrists
customer_reviews.text: My daughter fell hard on her wrist while roller skating. It wasn’t broke but needed some support and protection while healing. We tried wrapping but it was difficult, time consuming and she could not manage the wrap by herself. This brace was perfect for her little wrist (11 yrs old). It’s adjustable and we were able to trim the extra Velcro off of the straps for cleaner fit. She was able to go to school, play her saxophone and go on with her daily activities without worrying about further injury to her wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Not Great for Slender Wrist
customer_reviews.text: I never could get comfortable wearing this brace. I needed support for tendonitis. My wrist measures 6-inches in circumference, so it was slap dab in the middle of the range, but there was a big gap around the thumb section . The velcro straps are much too long, but that means they are just more than enough. I used scissors to trim the excess. The stiff part can be removed. I found it difficult to do many things wearing the brace and ended up using a different design with a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle Sue

customer_reviews.title: I have put this through the washing machine a half dozen times now and it washes wonderfully. Advice
customer_reviews.text: This product is equivalent to the one I received from the professionals... except this was a third of the price. Note: I have put this through the washing machine a half dozen times now and it washes wonderfully. Advice: the velcro straps are WAY too long to start with. However, you can easily cut them to length. That stops them being annoying!
customer_reviews.author: S. Blake

customer_reviews.title: Snip the dangle
customer_reviews.text: Cut the extra strap length. This eventually seems obvious, but I spent longer than I care to admit before realizing this. Everyone will have a different experience with size and tightness but for me this seems to work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Koygo

customer_reviews.title: Fit was not correct.
customer_reviews.text: This didn't fit my hand at all. I measured before I ordered, but the brace on the wrist side isn't positioned well. In order for the bend in the brace to be positioned correctly on my wrist, I had to move the brace so far toward my fingers that the thumb opening stuck way out from my hand and dug into my thumb on the arm side. I tried 3 and 2 seemed not to be sized for real people. Or maybe they're trying to fit too broad a range of people. Except for my arthritis in the fingers, I have smallish hands. That may be the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Gym Rat 71

customer_reviews.title: Not engineered for a human, gigantic
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. I used the posted measurements and ordered the recommended size. The splint curves away from the wrist an inch away. I flipped it and it is better that way but it curves away from the palm a full inch therefore providing no support. I have a large hand but this gigantic, does not fit at all. Not made for a woman. The straps are at least 4" too long. Flapping loose. Major fail.
customer_reviews.author: naturalbornshopper

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd of these wrist supports I have purchased. It is well made and sturdy. It allows for pressure to be taken off the wrist after you have strained it. My only complaint is how long the strap are and not more velcro to attach them to. I ended up having to cut the straps down so I didn't have an extra 4inches just flaming around. Once I did that the no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: B. Collins

customer_reviews.title: is more comfortable, and has all the missing features on the ...
customer_reviews.text: This hurts my wrist rather than giving comfort, perhaps due to the bend of the support, I'm not sure. The velcro straps are also way too long with no area to secure the extra length of the strap on. Which leaves the option of either cutting the extra or taping it down. The narrow area that goes between the thumb and 2nd finger is not adjustable and cuts into your hand through the day. I switched to the ProCare Quick-Fit II Wrist which doesn't hurt my wrist, is more comfortable, and has all the missing features on the DonJoy.
customer_reviews.author: Hoppy Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Good brace to aid carpal tunnel issues
customer_reviews.text: Good to aid with carpal tunnel pain. Sleep in brace to hold wrist in one position for healing as you sleep. Also, helps support wrist when holding tablet while reading Kindle books. Brace is not as long as it appears in picture, so I replaced it with two longer FUTURO brand braces (one for right, another for left wrist).
customer_reviews.author: Starchar

customer_reviews.title: This is a good support brace.......
customer_reviews.text: I'm in a lot of pain. I bought a wrist support brace at Walmart. I hoped it would help, but it didn't. The brace wasn't a good one. I ordered this brace with next day delivery (it was delivered today) Labor Day. This brace is a good one. it isolated my wrist and I barely have pain at all. I will see my doctor tomorrow. Thank you DonJoy !
customer_reviews.author: P. Cox photography

customer_reviews.title: kind of cheap and runs big
customer_reviews.text: This wrist brace seems kind of cheap to me and seemed large for my wrist even though I measured and ordered appropriately. I was more concerned with protecting the wrist especially when sleeping, and it does work for that but clunky and not as comfortable as other braces. A friend gave me one to borrow which fit much better, is of higher quality, and more comfortable, so I stick with that. I would return this brace, but I missed the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Carpal tunnel relief at night
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife, she has carpal tunnel. When she wears it at night it reduces her pain, we chose Don Joy because her orthopedist uses that brand and it was cheaper to order it through Amazon as opposed to ordering it through the doctor and paying the co-pay
customer_reviews.author: The Gigler

customer_reviews.title: Ok product - it does what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Ok product, it does what it is supposed to do. The bend in the wrist should be stronger like the one the doctor gave me for my other wrist. It works, but it just doesn't seem to fit as perfectly as the other for my other wrist. Good for the money though, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Mark P.

customer_reviews.title: This brace supports the wrist very well however it lacks velcro on lower end of the strap for it to properly be secured.
customer_reviews.text: The strap lacks velcro on the other end leaving the straps hanging lose. The fit is good and it supports the wrist very well but something must be done with the loose end of the strap. If you want to avoid taping down the loose end then you may want to consider a brace with shorter straps that tie down on their loose ends.
customer_reviews.author: Ilia

customer_reviews.title: Solid Brace that works as described.
customer_reviews.text: My Primary Care Doc recommended that I wear this brace for 3 weeks to help heal the tendon issue on the upper wrist and the nerve issue under the wrist. I was skeptical, however this worked like a champ. I wore it about 22 hours a day for 3 weeks and it was just enough time to heal the issues. Good product. After all that wear, it still looks new. Straps are long so that you can cut them to your size.
customer_reviews.author: Awinters

customer_reviews.title: Allows me to work without pain
customer_reviews.text: I have a small tear in my wrist, arthritic spots, and multiple cysts which can sometimes make my wrist ache, etc... However when I use this guard it totally helps and I’m able to use both hands for work. I’m on my 2nd one and have bought a third for safekeeping.
customer_reviews.author: CZ

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and does what it suppose to do.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a massage therapist, and I'm always researching and studying ways to take care of my joints. And this wrist bracelet is a great way to put your wrists to rest and recover after a long day. If you use your hands to work (computers, driving, massage therapists, hand writing, etc) you need your wrists to recover and rest. And this wrist cover won't let your carpal bones to move and bend and hence to heal and reduce sweling. And if you put it on kind of loose, you can sleep with it on. I saw results after 10 days of using it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: guillemiami

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a backup for my 7 year old son who got one from the doctor. This one was better then the one the doctor gave us. It is way softer and sturdier. My son loves the padding and said he feels better in it. Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Liana M. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Finally! A brace that works and relieves the pain
customer_reviews.text: Works SO much better than the one I bought at a discount retailer and another I ordered (and returned) from Amazon. Fits much better, the "spoon" (splint) fits into my palm much better and it's actually relieving the pain I'd developed from too much mouse use on a project at work. My only criticism is the length of the straps, which I'll probably have to trim down, if I can't figure out a way to tuck them in.
customer_reviews.author: JustMe

customer_reviews.title: works wonderfully for my ra
customer_reviews.text: I was diagnosed with rheumatoid arthritis four months ago. It was the most painful pain I have experienced when it was a full blown attack. I have tried several braces and this is by far the very best for me. I had terrific pain in the wrist and forearm due to inflammation of ligaments and tendons. This brace helped me tremendously and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca C.

customer_reviews.title: Best value for the quality
customer_reviews.text: Same as what the Dr gave me. Bought as replacement since I work (electrical) with them on all day. Get about 2moths, 4 washes before Velcro starts to unravel. Wrists doing great now. Haven't had to wear for quite a while now.
customer_reviews.author: JCroz

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it for a few days now and it is so much more comfortable than my other Don Joy one. My other one is thinner and very good for working out but I needed one that I could wear all day without irritating me arm or hand and this is way comfy because It is padded.
customer_reviews.author: Misssappy

customer_reviews.title: Bad straps
customer_reviews.text: This brace I wouldn't recommend, the straps don't stay once they have been put on securely. You have to keep placing the straps back on once they've been put on.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great Brace, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I adore this brace. I had carpal tunnel surgery a few years ago, and the doctor gave me this brace to keep my wrist in place during the healing process. It worked wonders for my recovery. So when I needed another one for my other wrist I just had to buy this brand. The upside is the cost here on Amazon is one quarter the price he charged! If I had a clue back then I would have come here first! Lesson learned! I recommend this brace for comfort and price!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Bend the removable metal splint to fit your wrist!
customer_reviews.text: It took me a couple days to shape the metal splint so that the brace wouldn't impinge my radial nerve and make my thumb go numb. The metal splint that goes along the palm and forearm has to be fitted so that the brace doesn't put pressure on essential structures, and it's very sturdy so don't be afraid to bend it. I like how well it breathes and wicks away sweat. I have terribly sweaty hands so it's nice to not have to worry about it feeling gross.
customer_reviews.author: Liam Midgley

customer_reviews.title: Might work for some people but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: It's very comfortable and feels well constructed but doesn't help my carpal tunnel symptoms much. It seems impossible to get the straps snug without also cutting off the circulation to my hand. The straps are crazy long (not a huge deal since you could just trim them). The hole for the thumb doesn't seem quite big enough. It presses against the base of my thumb and leaves a red mark, although it doesn't hurt. My last complaint is that the metal bar shifts a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best wrist and elbow support
customer_reviews.text: Fits snuggly, frame is firm so it does its job of keeping the wrist straight and immobile, material is not hot; it's lightweight, not bulky, not cumbersome, easy to slide forearm in and out, and cloth under straps provide comfort. As for the long straps, all you need to do is cut the extra lengths after you've fit them onto the Velcro, allowing some length allowance for adjustments of tightness. Cut rounded ends so no pointed corners to catch on anything, and you're set. I wake up with no pain every time I wear this at night.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Good brace, disappointed with the stitching quality
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Comfortable (no annoying seams to irritate skin) -Good size -Easy to adjust Cons: -Velcro straps are very long. They are hard to trim short without ends fraying and/or making it difficult to put on -Somewhat bulky. Hard to get sleeves and/or winter gloves on it -Edge stitching began to fray after a few weeks of occasional use -No instructions for washing
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great wrist braces for carpal tunnel's
customer_reviews.text: These are great wrist braces. A little expensive, but they work well. The straps are a bit long but that makes them easier to adjust in my opinion, and if you really wanted to you could clip off the extra length. The only reason they get four stars is that I think they run a bit small. I usually run between a XS and a S (I ordered a S based on the sizing chart), and I could've probably gone up to a M (which I never do in other brands).
customer_reviews.author: r0811

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid wrist brace. It is comfortable and provides good support. The elastic across the top of the wrist gives it a snug but flexible feeling. I'm not convinced the product will last for a long time, as the construction feels a little cheap. However, so far it's been great, and I use it almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: dhoped123

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your wrist in alignment day or night and pain free.
customer_reviews.text: These work great to keep your wrist in alignment whether you have ulnar nerve issues (elbow) when that affects the feeling in your two small fingers or palm; or carpal tunnel. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: egis

customer_reviews.title: Terrible brace
customer_reviews.text: This brace is horrible!! It is flimsy and doesn’t support anything!! A waste of money
customer_reviews.author: suzie32

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality palm area of brace ripped as soon as ...
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality palm area of brace ripped as soon as i got. It metal stabilizer bar was exposed will submit pic later
customer_reviews.author: Kyle williams sr

customer_reviews.title: This was the exact same brace we bought from Orthopedic Specialist for 12X the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. XS was perfect for a 4 year old boy. We used this as our "extra" wrist brace for swimming. I was shocked to see this was the exact same brace we bought from Orthopedic Specialist for $107. Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Protecting my hand and wrist while I sleep following left carpal tunnel relief surgery.
customer_reviews.text: This wrist support works great! I order this to protect my hand and wrist while I sleep following left carpal tunnel relief surgery. It's been great. I recommend 2 so that you can switch off wearing one, and airing the other. I had one shorter wrist guard that I am alternating with this one, with my preference bring this longer one.
customer_reviews.author: @LSieu

customer_reviews.title: Great product for wrist pain
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I wanted. It’s just like the other one I got from my doctor for my other wrist Excellent price. Helps my wrist
customer_reviews.author: lindaw26

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered.
customer_reviews.text: I looked for something that was similar to what was given to me by the hand specialist for bi-lateral carpal tunnel syndrome and it turned out it is the exact same as what was given to me. I wear it at night when I go to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dutton

customer_reviews.title: Better, maybe the best wrist brace than the other brands on here.
customer_reviews.text: Helps a lot on support when age and damage comes to the forefront when trying to do the basic activities of a country home owner.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Knutz ll

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: comfortable, easy to use, rigid. Cut my wrist pretty bad and had to keep wrist from moving but also needed to have some mobility. This worked well. Could fit it under coat, I could use a mouse and could type, (it was a little difficult, but better than what I expected.)
customer_reviews.author: Jim Fregelette

customer_reviews.title: Garbage! You are better off with a brace from your local pharmacy...
customer_reviews.text: Piece of overpriced junk. The bar that's supposed to stabilize your wrist is super thin, it bends and it slids out of the sleeve because it was not sewn up in one of the ends.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: OK - but foam-filled material traps heat and makes you sweaty
customer_reviews.text: Definitely works to stabilize your wrist, but the spongy foam material traps heat and makes your skin sweaty. I prefer the solid canvas kind that I've used in the past. They seem to breathe better than this one.
customer_reviews.author: AnkleBuster

customer_reviews.title: Fit true to Size
customer_reviews.text: Good for stabilization after carpel tunnel surgery. Needs just a bit more padding on the palm side for after surgery though.
customer_reviews.author: mcgee

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, good brace
customer_reviews.text: This brace works great for carpal tunnel syndrome. It seems to fit my very small hand well and doesn't allow any movement of the wrist. Only thing is it is kind of hot for summer wear. I can't seem to find on that IS made for summer....LOL! I have tried several and some fit me well and some don't .All in all it is a nice brace.
customer_reviews.author: BeckyWTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Can't sleep without them!
customer_reviews.text: I have carpal tunnel pretty bad. I cannot sleep without wearing one of these braces on each of my hands. These braces keep my wrist really straight so I don't bend my wrist when I sleep, as the pain would wake me up. They are pretty comfortable as well. Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: George H.

customer_reviews.title: Metal stabilizer bar ripped out of sewn pockets and scratches my arm
customer_reviews.text: I use this for work and it failed recently. The metal bar has come out of the sewn in Pocket. Is that normal or is that something that's was particular to the one that I purchased . If that happens to a lot of them then it's not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: TES

customer_reviews.title: Very supportive, but does limit what you can do.
customer_reviews.text: I like it as being very supportive, but it is also limit by the very thing that gives it so much support. The thumb through the strap and on the bottom, the heavy metal brace goes down the palm of your hand a little way. Makes it hard if you need to do much gripping. Terrific for something like carpal tunnel though and a desk job.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce V. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Product is okay
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t immobilize wrist quite as much as needed. Velcro straps were exceptionally long. Had to trim them with scissors, hoping they don’t begin to fray.
customer_reviews.author: Cayden Pobanz

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately having to wear is never fun but both of these braces worked very well for me. They were comfortable and well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Marie Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: Wrong material was used by manufacturer so velcroed straps didn't stick
customer_reviews.text: The brace would have been good if the end of the 3 straps stuck - but they didn't. Instead, they just hung down. And I assumed that I wasn't supposed to have trimmed the ends off as part of the deal with the brace - certainly there were no instructions to that effect. So, rather than go through the process of returning the brace, I found some old velcro pieces and sewed them on myself so that the brace was functional. But I shouldn't have had to do that - hence the rating.
customer_reviews.author: NMOzzie

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Like the one from my doctor so much that I had to find the same one. These are very comfortable and a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: expected far better quality than this
customer_reviews.text: Straps are ridiculously long but you can just cut them off so it's not that big of a deal. The pouch that holds the metal bar underneath the wrist is sewn into the neoprene or whatever material they use. That stitching has already come out, it no longer does the job. I've been wearing it for around 1.5 weeks, expected far better quality than this.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: just as good as the one from the orthopedic im sure they ...
customer_reviews.text: just as good as the one from the orthopedic im sure they charged my insurance a ton for. Got a spare for my son to wear in the water, he cauld not miss out on his swim and surf commitments and this got us thru till I found there was a waterproof one weeks later, this was far better with protection so was better off for the first few weeks
customer_reviews.author: KIM KIN

customer_reviews.title: Just what my broken wrist needed
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised and exactly what I needed for my broken wrist. Provided comfortable support, did not chafe my arm or wrist, just what I needed for the three weeks I had to wear it. It was delivered quickly and at a competitive price.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Incredible
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, for my right and left wirst. Nice sturdy metal supporting your wrist, very good build quality. Cut off extra slack as needed. Kept my wrists from hurting after a couple broken bones.
customer_reviews.author: Elias Bowes

customer_reviews.title: very painful condition. Don't know what caused the painful condition
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful for a temporary, very painful condition. Don't know what caused the painful condition, but now it's gone. Don't know what part the brace played in the condition going away but it helped alleviate the pain.
customer_reviews.author: J Mattila

customer_reviews.title: I'm out of warranty, but DonJoy helps keep me on the road to getting things done
customer_reviews.text: This really makes a difference when my wrist is telling me I've overdone it again. Quality is good, design works well, and I have had good experience with other DonJoy braces and supports. Easy on and off, completely adjustable and a good investment for me.
customer_reviews.author: RTfact

customer_reviews.title: good quality, works great
customer_reviews.text: Hubby has carpal tunnel and he really likes this brace. It fits well and is very adjustable. It has made a significant difference on his hand tingling issues. The quality is good and the price was better than locally - highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C. Crocker

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: The straps are very long and they stab me throughout the night. I wasn't impressed with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: it is a firm support and good quality, i am very satisfied with it
customer_reviews.text: It has helped my tendonitis a lot, it is a firm support and good quality, i am very satisfied with it. I ordered a small, have a very small frame; it is a very snug good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Annette van der Voort

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This one is the best one I’ve found online. Similar to the one that I got at the doctors for my other hand. Fits fine on my average size but there was plenty of extra room as the straps are huge.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great to sleep in if you have carpal tunnel.
customer_reviews.text: I have always wore these on my right hand since I had hand surgery and I'm right handed. I needed this to sleep in (recommended by my doctor) for my left hand because I think I'm getting carpal tunnel. I've wore it to bed every night since I got it and my hand feels better in the morning. :) Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: I am a petite but typically wear a M in gloves. This fit very well and sped up the recovery of a wrist injury that reoccurs. It cut the recovery time in half. I was so happy. The adjustable straps are way to long but Once I had it sized I trimmed them down.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Jamison

customer_reviews.title: Works and is exactly like the one I had to pay double for
customer_reviews.text: Works and is exactly like the one I had to pay double for,from the doctor I needed a few years ago
customer_reviews.author: Carlson

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT WRIST SUPPORT THAT IS FULLY ADJUSTABLE
customer_reviews.text: This wrist support fits well and is fully adjustable. Great for reducing carpal tunnel issues. Highly recommend this item and also the seller... item shipped quickly and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: tazbo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wears one on each wrist as her joints get very tired and sore. They restrict some movement but enough that she can't function. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Needed!
customer_reviews.text: This wrist brace is extremely well-made, and supports my wrist very, very well. I have tendonitis in my wrists, so I've worn several different types of wrist braces over the years. This one is by far the best one I've used, and seems like it'll last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick G.

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect. Great size
customer_reviews.text: This is almost exactly what I got from the doctor. It is perfect. Great size, super comfortable. The only thing I didn't like is the hard velcro strip goes the entire length, so when I wear it to sleep or if I'm wearing a sweater it will try and grab on to the soft fabrics of fuzzy blankets and sweaters. Totally worth it though to help with my carpel pain.
customer_reviews.author: Rissa

customer_reviews.title: bigger than i thought better than i thought
customer_reviews.text: i had smaller braces before but have found theses work better
customer_reviews.author: RTM

customer_reviews.title: Fine to wear in day
customer_reviews.text: Fine to wear in day, but CUTS OFF CIRCULATION to thumb while sleeping. Without fail, I wake up in the morning and my thumb is numb-- no matter how loose I make the straps. It also leaves a thick red line around thumb no matter what time of day. My previous brace went half way up my thumb (not just a loop around it) and worked much better without these issues. I would NOT buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable yet Supportive
customer_reviews.text: The is the most well-constructed brace I have ever worn. I had no idea it was German-engineered before I bought it, but that explains why it is so well-made. I highly recommend this for minor sprains or carpel tunnel syndrome.
customer_reviews.author: Galen

customer_reviews.title: it helps
customer_reviews.text: carpal tunnel hurts, your arms go numb, burn and tingle. This brace helps with the pinched nerve.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy C.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Just like what I wanted. Comfortable fit easy to put on
customer_reviews.author: Mark LeSage

customer_reviews.title: This really helps my arthritic wrist. However, you ...
customer_reviews.text: This really helps my arthritic wrist. However, you should have more than one if you use it chronically because they get a bit stinky if you don't wash them regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Glia Man

customer_reviews.title: Solved my proble
customer_reviews.text: I used this device for pre-carpal tunnel surgery. It provided the support I needed. And it is a well made product.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E. Stelter

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping, priced very well. We have this brace in right hand, but needed it for left. This version of the brace works well for our family. Would buy from here again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Needed an extra one for when 1 got dirty, worked well and had good support
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Svanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected. Identical brand to one I purchased (for my other wrist) from my primary care doctor's office for much, much more. Yes, straps need to be cut and shortened but this allows for personal fit adjustment. Very happy to get what I needed at such a savings from my doctor's office for identical product.
customer_reviews.author: mec1026

customer_reviews.title: Much better than using the flexible bandage wraps
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mom and she has been using it constantly! It's really been helping to stabilize her wrist ever since she sprained it. Much better than using the flexible bandage wraps.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit.
customer_reviews.text: Not a very good fit. I was trying to replace my previous wrist support that I loved. The metal piece was too long and wide in this one, so I replaced from the wrist support I already had and it fits better. Still not great.I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: lanerf

customer_reviews.title: Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: Well made. I did trim off approximately 1" or so on the straps so that the fit was more neat. I am anticipating that the brace will last as it is well made & spot cleaning appears to do well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple, inexpensive, and easy
customer_reviews.text: Simple, inexpensive, and easy. I had to cut off part of the straps, as other reviews said, but I didn't mind doing so because custom fits would have raised the price unnecessarily - I would much rather custom cut them than have to pay twice as much for a different "size".
customer_reviews.author: elreydelfin

customer_reviews.title: No thumb support
customer_reviews.text: Item was different from what was pictured. I purchased this specifically for the additional thumb support per my doctors recommendation. I received a completely different model with zero thumb support. Sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Schilz

customer_reviews.title: Good carpal tunnel brace.
customer_reviews.text: Great splint for carpal tunnel. Comfortable to wear when sleeping. My Dr gave me a print out of the page on Amazon. Exactly what the Dr ordered & less expensive than going through medical insurance.
customer_reviews.author: bsj

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: My doctor charges 5x for exactly the same thing. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would never recommend this product to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I would never recommend this product to anyone.ever. it is suppose to be gel in the pouch. Nothing is in the pouch it's empty. Material is cushion and cheap. For Someone Who Need This product For help. Do not buy this one. A waste if money. I am truly hurt and not satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Sheta N Davis

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This wrist support is uncomfortable and it has a very bad smell.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great product, ran smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, exactly what I wanted. Had to return the product because it was too small to be comfortable to sleep with it on. Definitely planning on purchasing a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This brace is ridiculously comfortable for the price, and it gives medium-high levels of stabilization. It allows for full use of the hand, but the palmar support has a bit of room to move up and down in it's sleeve, so make sure you move it to fit your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for carpal Tunnel
customer_reviews.text: Great for carpal Tunnel Scrpit for same was going to be a fortune
customer_reviews.author: simbas

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected and rivals the quality of the brace I received from my doctor for $100. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Defeyter

customer_reviews.title: this one is a really good replacement.
customer_reviews.text: I have carpal tunnel and my other brace got lost....this one is a really good replacement.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kellogg

customer_reviews.title: Soft arm brace that is good at stablelizing my wrist which have dropped
customer_reviews.text: Soft arm brace that is good at stablelizing my wrist which have dropped. However the seam arounf side side support can be rough and cut into hand
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth hamlin

customer_reviews.title: I have not decided if I can alter in someway to fit better.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed, with exception of them both being to large. Watch carefully your sizing. I have not decided if I can alter in someway to fit better.
customer_reviews.author: Debora

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.......
customer_reviews.text: In January, my husband broke his arm right above the wrist & after the cast came off, he was advised to get a support brace to wear at night. This fits the bill perfectly-comfortable, great support, perfect fit & the price wasn't bad either.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Helps With The Pain
customer_reviews.text: Love this splint. It really helps with the pain in my wrist...however, I wish it would last longer than 3 months. I still keep ordering it though...every three months.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma of 6

product_meta.title: DonJoy ComfortFORM Wrist Support Brace
product_meta.description: The DonJoy ComfortFORM Wrist Support Brace is intended for those suffering from sprains and strains, and for the treatment of Carpal Tunnel Syndrome (CTS). This wrist support is durable and lightweight, making it ideal for daily movement and low-impact activities. Includes a removable contoured aluminum palmer stay which helps control wrist flexion. The Velcro strapping helps provide an anatomically correct fit, ensuring proper support.
feature_bullets: Intended for those suffering from sprains and strains, and for the treatment of Carpal Tunnel Syndrome (CTS)
Durable and lightweight, making it ideal for daily movement and low-impact activities
Includes a removable contoured aluminum palmer stay which helps control wrist flexion
Velcro strapping helps provide an anatomically correct fit, ensuring proper support
